00033 int PredicativeSuffix::setXSDList()
00034 {
00035         if( _xsdTrie.create( 512, 128, 128, 64 ) < 0 )
00036         {
00037                 cerr << "Can't create trie. So xsd list is not created..." << endl;
00038 
00039                 return 0;
00040         }
00041 
00042         int countList = sizeof( _xsdInfoPoolList  ) / sizeof( struct XSDInfo );
00043         int i;
00044 
00045         for( i = 1; i < countList; i++ )
00046         {
00047                 setXSDInfo( _xsdInfoPoolList[i], i );
00048         }
00049 
00050         return 1;
00051 }

00053 int PredicativeSuffix::setXSDInfo( XSDInfo& xsdInfo, int pos )
00054 {
00055         const int sizeMAX = 10;
00056 
00057         char tempBuffer[ sizeMAX ];
00058         int  len = (int)strlen(xsdInfo.transForm);
00059 
00060         int i, j = 0;
00061 
00062         for( i = len - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
00063         {
00064                 tempBuffer[j++] = xsdInfo.transForm[i];
00065         }
00066 
00067         tempBuffer[j] = '\0';
00068 
00069         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00070 
00071         if( _xsdTrie.insertKey( tempBuffer, trieNode ) )
00072         {
00073                 if( trieNode.getData() > 0 )
00074                 {
00075                         cerr << "In predicative suffixes, Duplicated entries exist. Please check.." << endl;
00076                 }
00077                 else
00078                 {
00079                         trieNode.setData( pos );
00080                 }       
00081         }
00082         else
00083         {
00084                 cerr << "Error in setting XSD list.." << endl;
00085         }
00086 
00087         return 1;
00088 }

00095 int PredicativeSuffix::searchNgetInfoFromXsdTrie( const char* str, InfoBuffer& infoBuffer, int len)
00096 {
00097         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00098 
00099         // 속도 때문에 range 검사 일부러 안했음. len 값이 str의 길이보다 크면 문제발생 가능성있으므로, 유의해서 호출
00100 
00101         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str ); 
00102 
00103         if( len < 2 ) return 0;
00104 
00105         infoBuffer.initialize();
00106         
00107         int i;
00108 
00109         for( i = len - 1; i > 0; i-- )
00110         {
00111                 if( _xsdTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode ) )
00112                 {
00113                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00114                         {
00115                                 infoBuffer.appendInfo( i, trieNode.getData() );
00116                         }
00117                 }
00118                 else
00119                 {
00120                         break;
00121                 }
00122         }
00123 
00124         return 1;
00125 }

00129         return searchNgetInfoFromXsdTrie( strex.buffer(), (len ? len : (int)strex.length()) );
